wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[4 January|4]]''' - Actress [[Olivia Tennet]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 15]] is published.
==February==
* '''[[9 February|9]]''' - First official meeting of the [[Sociedad Tolkien Española]].
* '''[[15 February|15]]-[[18 February|18]]''' -  The first ''Colloquium on the Languages of Middle-earth'' starts at the house of [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship|E.L.F.]] member [[Bill Welden]].
* '''[[17 February|17]]''' - Singer [[Ed Sheeran]] is born.

==March==
* '''[[9 March|9]]''' - Norwegian translator [[Nils Werenskiold]] dies.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 16]] is published.

==April==
* '''[[10 April|10]]''' - ''[[The Atlas of Middle-earth]]'', revised edition, is published.
==May==
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 17]] is published.
==July==
* '''[[22 July|22]]''' - [[Margaret Carroux]], the translator of the first German ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''-translation, dies.
* '''[[25 July|25]]''' - Actor [[Brian Haines]] dies. 
* '''[[26 July|26]]-[[29 July|29]]''' - [[Mythcon 22]].
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 18]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[3 August|3]]''' - [[Priscilla Tolkien]] speaks on "J.R.R. Tolkien: Scholar and Storyteller" at the Martin Luther King Memorial Library in Washington, D.C. 
* '''[[19 August|19]]''' - [[Taum Santoski]], who assisted [[Christopher Tolkien]] with ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'' and wrote much of the base of ''[[The History of The Hobbit]]'', dies of cancer at the age of 32.
==September==
* '''[[20 September|20]]-[[22 September|22]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1991]].
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 19]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 28|''Mallorn'' 28]] is published.

==October==
* '''?''' - [[Elendor]], the oldest Multi-User Shared Hallucination (MUSH) server, is established.  
==November==
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[After the King|After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 20]] is published.

==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s secretary [[Joy Hill]] dies.
* '''?''' - The [[Sociedad Tolkien Española]] is founded.
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien - The Centenary Calendar 1992]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1992 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Tolkien Diary 1992]]'' is published.

{{Years|1988|1989|1990|1991|1992|1993|1994|}}
